full_output.summary: Enthusiastic Computer Science student with hands-on experience in software development, web development, and backend technologies. Proven track record in contributing to diverse projects and internships with a focus on improving system performance and user experience. Seeking opportunities to leverage technical skills in a dynamic environment.

projects.name: Weather App

projects.name: Mini Projects
projects.description: Creating various mini-projects focused on AI integration, utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

experiences.description: Familiarized with JP Morgan Chase frameworks, applied Python and libraries, and utilized Git for version control. Contributing to backend development and system modifications for company projects, improving functionality and performance.
Organizing and leading events with a team to foster community engagement and knowledge sharing.
